Document.Name: Publish Notice root element
Document.Description: The Publish Notice is a transaction which sends notices and their attachments as new notices or updates to already known notices to the publication offices.

Attribute.Name: Publish Notice Identifier
Attribute.Description: Specifies the unique identifier for an Identifiable Publish Notice.

Attribute.Name: Mode
Attribute.Description: Mode for the publishment of the notice, regarding if it is new or a change to an already existing notice. If a notice does not exist, the publishing office MUST create it as a new notice. If a notice already exists,the publishing office MUST not alter the existing object and instead it MUST create a new version of the existing object using the state of the submitted notice. So it is ensured that the old notice will not be overwritten but stays readable as an outdated version.

Element.Name: SpecificationIdentification
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.

Element.Name: BusinessProcessTypeIdentifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the receiver to process the document in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: IssueDateTime
Element.Description: The issue date and time when the Publish Notice is issued. The issue date time must have granularity of seconds, and include time zone information.

Element.Name: SenderElectronicAddress
Element.Description: The electronic address of the sender.

Attribute.Name: SchemeIdentifier
Attribute.Description: The type is used to assign the scheme identifier attribute from the list of "PEPPOL Party Identifiers described in the "PEPPOL Policy for using Identifiers"

Element.Name: EndpointId
Element.Description: The endpoint ID of the sender platform

Element.Name: ReceiverElectronicAddress
Element.Description: The electronic address of the receiver.

Attribute.Name: Scheme Identifier
Attribute.Description: The type is used to assign the scheme identifier attribute from the list of "PEPPOL Party Identifiers described in the "PEPPOL Policy for using Identifiers"

Element.Name: EndpointId
Element.Description: The endpoint ID of the receiver platform

Element.Name: Registry Object List
Element.Description: The Registry Object List returns the requested Information. It identifies the notice instances that were affected by the Publish Notice.

Element.Name: Registry Object
Element.Description: The Registery Object returns a notice instance that matches the Search Notice Request.

Attribute.Name: Procedure Identifier
Attribute.Description: The Procedure Identifier allows distinguishing procurement procedures and shall be globally unique. It identifies the procurement procedure the notice belongs to. In PEPPOL the Procedure Identifier is also named "Reference Number" or "ContractFolderID". In the later eTendering process the element is used to find the right procedure for a Procurement Procedure Subscription (P001).

Attribute.Name: Notice Identifier
Attribute.Description: Specifies the notice identifier (BT-701) allowing to uniquely distinguishing the notice amongst all other existing ones contained within the query.

Element.Name: Document Type Code
Element.Description: Used to identify the UBL document type of the referenced notice which are associated to the corresponding UBL namespaces.

Attribute.Description: The list has to be defined! TODO

Element.Name: Repository Item Reference
Element.Description: The Repository Item Reference specifies a reference to the XML notice that is included to the local ASiC-E container (Associated Signature Container Extended) repository.

Attribute.Name: List Identifier
Attribute.Description: This element uses xlink:href to specify local XML notices of the ASiC-E container as repository items.
